page.title: 15The Severnaires Jazz Band
page.content: This marching 'Jazz' band was formed about nine years ago. I joined a year ago and play the 'Kazoo' in the fourth rank. We have two side drums, one bass drum, three tambourines and one cymbal. This is the Drum Court. We march in six ranks and there are two mace bearers. We meet every Monday and Wednesday at Sandy Lane Infants School and pay 20p a week to help to pay for new instruments and uniforms,etc. The Drum Court wear grey uniforms with pink hats and the ranks wear pink uniforms with grey hats. I enjoy being a member of this jazz band because I love marching and parading to the music of the band.
